abstract: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas capped an eventful day on the campaign trail Tuesday with an interview on "The O'Reilly Factor" in which he criticized his chief rival, Mitt Romney.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas capped an eventful day on the campaign trail Tuesday with an interview on "The O'Reilly Factor" in which he criticized his chief rival, Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas capped an eventful day on the campaign trail Tuesday with an interview on "The O'Reilly Factor" on the Fox News Channel. He expressed regret for participating in campaign debates, which have largely resulted in poor reviews for him. And yet again, he came in tongue a-blazin', this time with some choice digs at his chief rival, former Gov. Mitt Romney of Massachusetts.

headline.main: Perry Makes Digs at Romney on Fox News
